english: Unlawful search of , or intrusion into , a citizen 's home is prohibited .
chinese: 禁止非法搜查或者非法侵入公民的住宅。

english: It is shocking that he has never been made to realize his duties as a citizen .
chinese: 简直太不可思议了，他居然连做公民的义务都不懂。

english: Don't you think they speak well for our civic pride and moral upbringing ?
chinese: 难道你不认为他们对于我们公民的自尊心和道德的培养谈得很好吗？

english: But there are literally millions of citizens who have entered government service at all levels .
chinese: 但参加政府各级服务的公民的的确确数以百万计。

english: Elected governor of louisiana in 1928, he redeemed his promises to the common people .
chinese: 1928年，他被选为路易斯安那州长，履行了他对公民的诺言。
公民的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The company which is trying to be a good citizen everywhere will hire local personnels .
chinese: 那种不管在什么地方都力图成为一个好公民的公司，则总是雇用当地人员。

english: They have been repelled by the apparent sophistry of parts of his essay on "civil disobedience" .
chinese: 对他在《论公民的不服从》一文中某些显而易见的诡辩，他们颇有反感。

english: It was chiefly the poorer citizens of athens who sustained this empire by their most vigorous and incessant personal service .
chinese: 维持这个帝国的主要是雅典的贫苦公民的极端奋勇和孜孜不倦的个人服役。

english: Removal and deportation of other british citizens
chinese: 其他英国公民的遣送及递解离境

english: Don ' t overlook the development of people ' s moral right
chinese: 不应忽视公民的道德权利建设

english: My humble opinion on citizen ' s view of law being supreme
chinese: 刍论公民的法律至上观

english: On civil right to learn the truth and its protection
chinese: 浅论公民的知情权及其保护

english: The rights of our citizens are governed by charter
chinese: 我们公民的权利是由宪章规定的。
